title: travelplanner: Could you arrange a 5-day travel plan for two individuals, leaving from Cedar Rapids and visiting two cities in Texas from March 11th until March 15th, 2022? Our budget is set at $2,400. Our accommodations must allow visitors. Regarding dining, we enjoy Mediterranean, Indian, Italian, and Chinese cuisines. And please ensure that our travels do not involve any flights, as we prefer other modes of transportation. (790571c41f1f6cd0)

always_included_messages.content: Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.

chat_history.content: Could you arrange a 5-day travel plan for two individuals, leaving from Cedar Rapids and visiting two cities in Texas from March 11th until March 15th, 2022? Our budget is set at $2,400. Our accommodations must allow visitors. Regarding dining, we enjoy Mediterranean, Indian, Italian, and Chinese cuisines. And please ensure that our travels do not involve any flights, as we prefer other modes of transportation.

function.name: delegate
function.arguments: {"instructions":"Plan a 5-day travel itinerary for two individuals leaving from Cedar Rapids and visiting two cities in Texas from March 11th to March 15th, 2022. The budget is $2,400. Accommodations must allow visitors. Preferred cuisines are Mediterranean, Indian, Italian, and Chinese. Travel should not involve flights."}

chat_history.content:
### 5-Day Travel Itinerary for Two Individuals

#### Overview
- **Departure City:** Cedar Rapids
- **Destination Cities:** Austin and San Antonio, Texas
- **Travel Dates:** March 11th to March 15th, 2022
- **Budget:** $2,400
- **Preferred Cuisines:** Mediterranean, Indian, Italian, Chinese
- **Travel Mode:** Self-driving

#### Day 1: March 11th, 2022
- **Travel to Austin**
  - **Duration:** 15 hours 7 mins
  - **Distance:** 1,698 km
  - **Cost:** $84

- **Accommodation in Austin**
  - **Option 1:** Spacious Williamsburg 1 bedroom!
    - **Price:** $455 per night
    - **Room Type:** Entire home/apt
    - **House Rules:** No smoking
    - **Maximum Occupancy:** 2
  - **Option 2:** 1 Bedroom, Beautiful Spacious Brownstone Apt
    - **Price:** $68 per night
    - **Room Type:** Entire home/apt
    - **House Rules:** No parties, No children under 10, No smoking
    - **Maximum Occupancy:** 2

#### Day 2: March 12th, 2022
- **Explore Austin**
  - **Attractions:**
    - Texas Capitol
    - Zilker Metropolitan Park
    - Museum of the Weird
    - Cathedral of Junk
    - Bullock Texas State History Museum

- **Dining in Austin**
  - **Options:**
    - Tandoori Nights (Indian, Italian, BBQ, Seafood)
    - Cup-a-licious (Chinese, BBQ, Italian)
    - The Blue Door Cafe (Mediterranean, Desserts)
    - Bikanervala (Mediterranean, Fast Food)

#### Day 3: March 13th, 2022
- **Travel to San Antonio**
  - **Duration:** 1 hour 19 mins
  - **Distance:** 128 km
  - **Cost:** $6

- **Accommodation in San Antonio**
  - **Option 1:** Charming Bedroom in Gramercy
    - **Price:** $353 per night
    - **Room Type:** Private room
    - **House Rules:** No visitors, No parties
    - **Maximum Occupancy:** 2
  - **Option 2:** Private House in Trendy Crown Heights
    - **Price:** $642 per night
    - **Room Type:** Entire home/apt
    - **House Rules:** No smoking
    - **Maximum Occupancy:** 4

#### Day 4: March 14th, 2022
- **Explore San Antonio**
  - **Attractions:**
    - San Antonio River Walk
    - SeaWorld San Antonio
    - San Antonio Missions National Historical Park
    - Six Flags Fiesta Texas
    - San Antonio Museum of Art (SAMA)

- **Dining in San Antonio**
  - **Options:**
    - Martin's BBQ (Indian, Seafood)
    - Cream Stone (Mediterranean, Desserts)
    - Pita Pit (Mediterranean, French, Bakery)
    - Cafe Shaze (Mediterranean, Italian)

#### Day 5: March 15th, 2022
- **Travel back to Cedar Rapids**
  - **Duration:** 16 hours 15 mins
  - **Distance:** 1,821 km
  - **Cost:** $91

### Budget Breakdown
- **Accommodation:**
  - Austin: $68 x 2 nights = $136 (1 Bedroom, Beautiful Spacious Brownstone Apt)
  - San Antonio: $353 x 2 nights = $706 (Charming Bedroom in Gramercy)
- **Travel Costs:**
  - Cedar Rapids to Austin: $84
  - Austin to San Antonio: $6
  - San Antonio to Cedar Rapids: $91
- **Total Accommodation and Travel Costs:** $1,023
- **Remaining Budget for Food and Activities:** $1,377

This itinerary ensures a comfortable stay, enjoyable dining experiences, and visits to popular attractions within the budget.

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").
current_city.title: Current City

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"
transportation.title: Transportation

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"
breakfast.title: Breakfast

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"
attraction.title: Attraction

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
accommodation.title: Accommodation

chat_history.content:
### 5-Day Travel Itinerary for Two Individuals

#### Overview
- **Departure City:** Cedar Rapids
- **Destination Cities:** Austin and San Antonio, Texas
- **Travel Dates:** March 11th to March 15th, 2022
- **Budget:** $2,400
- **Preferred Cuisines:** Mediterranean, Indian, Italian, Chinese
- **Travel Mode:** Self-driving

#### Day 1: March 11th, 2022
- **Travel to Austin**
  - **Duration:** 15 hours 7 mins
  - **Distance:** 1,698 km
  - **Cost:** $84

- **Accommodation in Austin**
  - **Option 1:** Spacious Williamsburg 1 bedroom!
    - **Price:** $455 per night
    - **Room Type:** Entire home/apt
    - **House Rules:** No smoking
    - **Maximum Occupancy:** 2
  - **Option 2:** 1 Bedroom, Beautiful Spacious Brownstone Apt
    - **Price:** $68 per night
    - **Room Type:** Entire home/apt
    - **House Rules:** No parties, No children under 10, No smoking
    - **Maximum Occupancy:** 2

#### Day 2: March 12th, 2022
- **Explore Austin**
  - **Attractions:**
    - Texas Capitol
    - Zilker Metropolitan Park
    - Museum of the Weird
    - Cathedral of Junk
    - Bullock Texas State History Museum

- **Dining in Austin**
  - **Options:**
    - Tandoori Nights (Indian, Italian, BBQ, Seafood)
    - Cup-a-licious (Chinese, BBQ, Italian)
    - The Blue Door Cafe (Mediterranean, Desserts)
    - Bikanervala (Mediterranean, Fast Food)

#### Day 3: March 13th, 2022
- **Travel to San Antonio**
  - **Duration:** 1 hour 19 mins
  - **Distance:** 128 km
  - **Cost:** $6

- **Accommodation in San Antonio**
  - **Option 1:** Charming Bedroom in Gramercy
    - **Price:** $353 per night
    - **Room Type:** Private room
    - **House Rules:** No visitors, No parties
    - **Maximum Occupancy:** 2
  - **Option 2:** Private House in Trendy Crown Heights
    - **Price:** $642 per night
    - **Room Type:** Entire home/apt
    - **House Rules:** No smoking
    - **Maximum Occupancy:** 4

#### Day 4: March 14th, 2022
- **Explore San Antonio**
  - **Attractions:**
    - San Antonio River Walk
    - SeaWorld San Antonio
    - San Antonio Missions National Historical Park
    - Six Flags Fiesta Texas
    - San Antonio Museum of Art (SAMA)

- **Dining in San Antonio**
  - **Options:**
    - Martin's BBQ (Indian, Seafood)
    - Cream Stone (Mediterranean, Desserts)
    - Pita Pit (Mediterranean, French, Bakery)
    - Cafe Shaze (Mediterranean, Italian)

#### Day 5: March 15th, 2022
- **Travel back to Cedar Rapids**
  - **Duration:** 16 hours 15 mins
  - **Distance:** 1,821 km
  - **Cost:** $91

### Budget Breakdown
- **Accommodation:**
  - Austin: $68 x 2 nights = $136 (1 Bedroom, Beautiful Spacious Brownstone Apt)
  - San Antonio: $353 x 2 nights = $706 (Charming Bedroom in Gramercy)
- **Travel Costs:**
  - Cedar Rapids to Austin: $84
  - Austin to San Antonio: $6
  - San Antonio to Cedar Rapids: $91
- **Total Accommodation and Travel Costs:** $1,023
- **Remaining Budget for Food and Activities:** $1,377

This itinerary ensures a comfortable stay, enjoyable dining experiences, and visits to popular attractions within the budget.

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.
city.title: City

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.
city.title: City

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.
state.title: State

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.
departure_city.title: Departure City

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.
destination_city.title: Destination City

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.
date.title: Date

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.
origin.title: Origin

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.
destination.title: Destination

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.
city.title: City
